actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit foreign nationals from making contributions or donations in connection with State and local ballot initiatives and referenda.
short_title: Keeping Foreign Money Out of Politics Act of 2015

summary.text:
Keeping Foreign Money Out of Politics Act of 2015

Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit foreign nationals from making contributions or donations in connection with state and local ballot initiatives and referenda.

titles.title: Keeping Foreign Money Out of Politics Act of 2015
